id: House Democrat calls Matt Whitaker 'an assassin' hired to 'kill' Russia investigation
paragraph: By Caroline Kelly, CNNUpdated 7:15 PM ET, Mon November 12, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Rep. Eric Swalwell called acting Attorney General Matt Whitaker an "assassin" hired by President Donald Trump to "kill" special counsel Robert Mueller's investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.
